GameDBLocalizedString.Text: Perhaps these autonomous "butcher machines" had a peaceful purpose before the Holy War, but given their death-bringing potential, it isn't easy to imagine. So far, we have only discovered that they are deeply rooted in the Primals' underground energy system. Hey, science, you used to be useful, do you remember?!

Otudus Terrordon, widely known as Apex, hasn't originated in the Siren System, but from a population of a few strictly monitored individuals in an Earth lab. It's not clear how, why, or by whom it was brought here, but it's obvious this ferocious predator is prospering pretty well in its new home. Maybe too well.
